law.text: The department shall have the right to acquire such property as may be necessary to carry out the purpose of this chapter, and it shall have the right of eminent domain as provided in the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 65. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 6, effective June 19, 1952. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 1.
